scripts.remove-graph-node: cd graph-node && docker-compose down && pnpm clean-graph-node
scripts.run-graph-node: cd graph-node && pnpm clean-graph-node && docker-compose up
scripts.deploy-local: graph deploy --node http://localhost:8020/ --ipfs http://localhost:5001 ets/ets-local --version-label dev
scripts.ship-local: pnpm prepare-local && pnpm codegen && pnpm remove-local && pnpm create-local && pnpm deploy-local
scripts.ship-mumbai: pnpm prepare-mumbai && pnpm codegen && pnpm deploy-mumbai
